line: i i i was um i was taking a nap
since when do take naps in that position
oh god monica tell me you were waiting for a guy
please tell me you were waiting for a guy
that cute waiter guy from your restaurant the one that looks like a non threatening ray liotta
yknow what just give me a second and be out of your hair
when i get back i want every little detail
okay umm okay umm it is just joey and ross
why are not you guys at the movie
but ross was talking so loud on his phone they threw us out
i had to talk loud because the movie was loud
did he get in touch with emily
he is calling everyone on her side of the family hoping that someone will help him get in touch with her
i i i do not care if i said some other girls name you prissy old twit
way to suck up to the family
so glad you guys are all here
my office finally got wrinkle free fax paper
oh no no no no no no vomit tux
do not worry i had it dry cleaned
who vomited on yknow what what you up to joe
well doing this telethon thing on tv and my agent got me a job as co host
a little uh good deed for pbs and a little tv exposure now that is the kind of math joey likes to do
ugh what is right with them
why don’t you like pbs pheebs
okay because right after my mom killed herself i was just in this really bad place yknow personally
so i just thought that it had make me feel better if i wrote to sesame street because they were so nice when i was a little kid
well yknow a lot of those muppets do not have thumbs
all i got was a lousy key chain
and by that time i was living in a box
sorry pheebs i just yknow i just wanted to do a good deed
like like you did with the babies
this is not a good deed you just wanted to get on tv
what about you having those babies for your brother
what what are you talking about
well yeah it was a really nice thing and all but it made you feel really good right
it made you feel good so that makes it selfish
look there is no unselfish good deeds sorry
there are totally good deeds that are selfless
well may i ask for one example
yeah it is yknow there is no you may not
that is because all people are selfish
yeah well sorry to burst that bubble pheebs but selfless good deeds do not exist
and you the deal on santa clause right
gonna find a selfless good dead
gonna beat you you evil genius
oh my god it is emily
ross only ringing to say stop harassing my relatives
okay you can hang up but gonna keep calling
gonna gonna call everyone in england if that is what it takes to get you to talk to me
well at least i think i do
hey joey when you said the deal with santa clause you meant
so chandler have you heard about monicas secret boyfriend
she uh she uh she uh might have mentioned him
so mon when are we gonna meet this new secret waiter man
i i don’t think he is up to meeting everyone yet
yeah i do not think he is up to meeting everyone yet
i wanna meet this guy who is the best s x she ever had
well emilys willing to work on the relationship
she wants me to move to london
what what what are you gonna do
i bet if i talk to carol and susan i can convince them to move to london with ben
yeah sure your ex wife will be more than happy to move to another country so you can patch things up with your new wife
but uh not really expecting a lot of calls
no you answer it and take pledges
no gary collins is the host
you will be answering the phones
you do not seem to understand
i cannot believe i cannot find a selfless good deed
yknow that old guy that lives next to me
well i snuck over there and and raked up all the leaves on his front stoop
but he caught me and force fed me cider and cookies
maybe all good deeds are selfish
i will find a selfless good deed
because i just gave birth to three children and i will not let them be raised in a world where joey is right
can i ask you a cooking question
if you are cooking on the stove does that mean that your new secret boyfriend is better in bed than richard
well yknow i i i think gonna respect the privacy of my new secret boyfriend
i mean if this guy was me and it was me who had learned that it was me who was the best you had ever had be going like this
all right emily as much as i love you sorry i cannot move to london without ben
i understand that would be difficult
yeah would you please consider moving here
i mean you were gonna move here anyway why cannot you just do that
i do not know it is just
oh oh okay but but i know that even though been a a complete idiot up til now i mean i mean you you you have to come here
you have to come here so we can work this out
all right did you just say all right
oh emily that is that is so great
it is gonna be so great
we are gonna be like like like two idiots in love
ross there is one thing that really scares me still
well you have to understand how humiliating it was for me up on that altar in front of my entire family all my friends
i am i am so sorry
and then after decided to forgive you seeing you at the airport catching our plane with her
i mean i cannot i cannot be in the same room as her
it drives me mad just thinking of you being in the same room as her
emily there is nothing between rachel and me
come to new york and we will try and make this work
as long as you do not see rachel anymore
so i asked emily if she would come to new york and she said yes
only if i promise never to see rachel again
you cannot what did you tell her
i told her have to think about it
i mean how the hell am i supposed to make this kind of a decision
well you cannot just not see rachel anymore she is one of your best friends
but he cannot not exactly see emily i mean that is his wife
yeah but you have known rachel since high school and you cannot just cut her out of your life
thanks for the help problem solved
we have been watching all day when are you gonna be on tv
see there was kind of a mix up in my agents office but still on tv and that is good exposure
oh uh okay how how about now
now maybe you just like wanna but the whole duck in there
how many times have i told you guys you never watch the cooking channel
uh listen i need that broiling pan that joey borrowed the other day
uh yeah we used it when the duck was throwing up caterpillars
umm hey umm joeys gonna be at the telethon for the rest of the day we have the whole place to ourselves
well i just thought maybe you had wanna book some time with the best you had ever had
hey joey i just wanted to let you know that i found a selfless good deed
i just went down to the park and i let a bee sting me
what good is that gonna do anybody
well it helps the bee look tough in front of his bee friends
the bee is happy and i am definitely not
now yknow the bee probably died after he stung ya
hey excuse me would you mind switching with me
hey no way in the shot man
you have been here all day
yeah i taking pledges here eh
welcome back to our fall telethon
now if you have been enjoying the performance of circ du sole and you had like to see more of the same kind of programming it is very simple
all you have to do is call in your pledge and at that time tell the operator one of our volunteers what kind of programming you had like to
it is too difficult so just gonna leave it entirely to the gods of fate
you cannot be serious you cannot make this decision with a toy
ooh it is not a toy
well i do not know what else to do
i mean i either keep my wife and lose one of my my my best friends or i keep my friend and get divorced the second time before 30
so so if anyone has has a better suggestion let us hear it
all right do not be shy any suggestion will do
magic 8 ball should i never see rachel again
will chandler have s x tonight
seems like it works to me
i would like to make a pledge
i mean after what sesame street did to ya
oh still mad at them but i also now that they bring happiness to lots of kids who is moms did not kill themselves so by supporting them doing a good thing but not happy about it
so there a selfless good deed
and you do not a little good about donating the money
i was saving up to buy a hamster
what those things are like 10 bucks
yeah not the one i had my eye on
it looks like we have surpassed last years pledge total
the pledge that did it was taken by one of our volunteers oh boy
and may i say one of our sharpest dressed volunteers mr
oh look look joeys on tv
my pledge got joey on tv
oh that makes me feel oh no
look maybe i got carried away before
but there is something you gotta know
if the best it is only because you have made me the best
i mean i was nothing before you
call the other girls and ask
but when with you and we are together oh my god
now i understand if you never want to sleep with me again but that would be wrong
we owe it to s x
oh my when is joey gonna be home
well i was kinda hoping we could do this without him
oh no no no leave the gloves on
but i just cleaned the bathroom
yeah why do not we lose the gloves
all right let us show them how it is done
yknow that was not part of it
she is gettin her grove back in like 20 minutes
yeah i uh totally forgot about that
you mind if i take a rain check
waiting for a call from emily
hey i hear you do not have to go to london
it is not that easy there is still a lot of relationship stuff
well why do not you talk to me about it maybe i can help
i mean i kinda have to do this without your help
well i i know you can do that too
just just saying if you need somebody to talk to hi
look whatever this relationship stuff that emily wants just give it to her
come on the bottom line here is that you love her
so just fix whatever she wants fixed
i mean you are gonna have to try
you will just gonna hate yourself if you do not
look umm yes been thinking about that thing that you wanted me to do and i can do it
so will you come to new york
